channel.title: Bets graphx EVAR!!!!
channel.description:
watched the trailer in 1080P. beats ARMA2 and Crysis in my opinion. its like there is no such thing as 2d in this game.
[COLOR='Red']*IT IS A HUNTING GAME*
[url='https://www.thehunter.com']Here[/url] is the game
Trailer (WATCH IN 1080P!!!) [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jvIDWeafCpk']Click Here[/url]

item.description:
On a different note, this would make for a very cool bow and arrow fps pvp mod. Especially with the binoculars. And if you could like put on camouflage.

item.title: Bets graphx EVAR!!!!
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
av3nger:

That statement has never been more incorrect. In every way a game is made that is incorrect technologically and experience wise. Basically you are saying: (Analogy) Half-Life 2 sucks compared to crysis 2. Which is not the case for ME anyway. Half-Life all the way. Pretty stupid when people actually DO do stupid idiotic things like that. “The orange box blows, modern warfare 2 forever” They were made in separate years dumb ass…would be my reply.

:what:

That’s like saying

[COLOR=‘Yellow’]“Graphics factor into good gameplay - without good graphics, a game sucks. Look at doom, it has horrible graphics and is a great game.”

Read full topic

item.title: Bets graphx EVAR!!!!
item.dc:creator: Shinobi
item.description:
av3nger:

That statement has never been more incorrect. In every way a game is made that is incorrect technologically and experience wise. Basically you are saying: (Analogy) Half-Life 2 sucks compared to crysis 2. Which is not the case for ME anyway. Half-Life all the way. Pretty stupid when people actually DO do stupid idiotic things like that. “The orange box blows, modern warfare 2 forever” They were made in separate years dumb ass…would be my reply.

… What? If you are saying that the year a game comes out should not be a deciding factor in its playability, then you two are arguing the same point. But frankly, I can’t figure out what you are trying to say. Your second “sentence” isn’t even a sentence.

Read full topic

item.description:
Insomniac:

I want to hunt rabbits with a rocket launcher. Can I do that?

This is the game for you
https://www.mobygames.com/game/windows/natural-fawn-killers

The only Hunting Games I actually liked were NFK and the Carnivores games (man I love dinosaurs since I was 4 or even younger)
